plays.text: Penalty to Stephane Robidas 2 minutes for High Sticking Steve Begin
Goal scored by Stephane Quintal assisted by Yanic Perreault and Oleg Petrov
Penalty to Craig Rivet 2 minutes for Tripping Dean McAmmond
Goal scored by Dave Lowry assisted by Jarome Iginla and Robyn Regehr
Penalty to Craig Conroy 2 minutes for Hooking Patrice Brisebois
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla unassisted
Penalty to Chris Clark 2 minutes for Interference Patrice Brisebois
Goal scored by Brian Savage assisted by Patrice Brisebois and Mike Ribeiro
Penalty to Steve Montador 2 minutes for Hooking BENOIT GRATTON
Goal scored by DOUGLAS GILMOUR assisted by Yanic Perreault and Patrice Brisebois
Penalty to Toni Lydman 2 minutes for Hooking DOUGLAS GILMOUR
Goal scored by Oleg Petrov assisted by DOUGLAS GILMOUR and Stephane Quintal
